resources.string: The Only Place for Sole Searching

Welcome to big flex, the number one brand for authentic street-wear.
We do our best to service all styles.
Here's how it works:
First: Do some Sole Searching.
Second : Size them up!
Third : Add them to the cart.
Then : Just rinse and repeat if you're going on a shopping spree.
 Lastly : Checkout and we will have your new kicks your feet in a flash.
